job_title: Accounting - Holiday Inn Lampung Bukit Randu
job_description:
Main Responsibilities:
Record, verify, and update daily financial transactions into the accounting system.
Assist in Accounts Payable (AP) and Accounts Receivable (AR) processes, including invoice checking, billing, and payment follow up.
Prepare daily, weekly, and monthly financial reports as assigned.
Support the month-end closing process and ensure all entries are accurate and complete.
Maintain proper documentation and filing of financial records.
Assist the Finance & Accounting team in any administrative tasks.

Qualifications:
Male/female.
Fresh graduates or those with experience in accounting (especially in hospitality industry) are welcome.
Strong understanding of basic accounting principles and financial reporting.
Proficient in Microsoft Excel; experience with accounting software is an advantage.
Detail oriented, accurate, and able to maintain confidentiality.
Good communication skills and ability to work collaboratively.
Professional attitude and disciplined in meeting deadlines.
